A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't want to say this but I must say it: This is the worst Star Wars movie ever! I'm a big fan\, and after 30 minutes I already knew that it was going to be a disaster. So disappointed! This is the Terminator 3 for Star Wars. This is the Crystal Skull for Indiana Jones. This is the Episode I for the new trilogy. The script is so lame\, full of non-sense stories\, fake romanticism\, fake heroism\, and fake Force! The acting was poor\, like a bunch of non-Star Wars Fans making fun of Star Wars. They destroyed completely the true meaning of Star Wars. I wished that there were a huge CTRL-Z button for this movie.
